metadata.title: CVE-2018-8000 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In PoDoFo 0.9.5, there exists a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability inPoDoFo::PdfTokenizer::GetNextToken() in PdfTokenizer.cpp, a related issueto CVE-2017-5886. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability tocause a denial-of-service or potentially execute arbitrary code via acrafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
